project.name: Project
project.projectDescription: Projects are fundamental units for organizing R&D activities, workflows, and resources. They provide teams with centralized planning, tracking, reporting, and acceptance capabilities. The key workflow is as follows:
project.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete project 【{name}】?
project.adminHint: Only admin, creator, and owner can modify or delete projects.

addProjectStep.title: Add Project
addProjectStep.text: Create the foundation for managing development and testing activities. Establish centralized planning, tracking, reporting, and acceptance workflows.

planIterationAndTest.title: Plan Sprint & Testing
planIterationAndTest.text: Define responsibilities, timelines, goals, and acceptance criteria. Enable organized execution while ensuring software quality and reliability.

developAndTest.title: Execute Development & Testing
developAndTest.text: Follow plans to conduct development and testing activities. Continuously track tasks, defects, requirements, user stories, and test items.

reportResults.title: Report Results
reportResults.text: Summarize R&D outcomes including progress, efficiency metrics, data assets, and test results to support successful project delivery.

agile.features: Core Features: Scrum Framework • Incremental Delivery • User-Driven Requirements
agile.scenarios: Ideal for: Agile development teams requiring rapid sprint

general.features: Core Features: Work Breakdown • Progress Management • Dependency Visualization
general.scenarios: Ideal for: Traditional R&D teams with cross-departmental projects

testing.features: Core Features: Custom Test Plans • Multi-type Testing • Defect Tracking
testing.scenarios: Ideal for: QA teams managing specialized testing projects

form.projectNamePlaceholder: A brief project name, maximum 100 characters
form.timePlanDescription: Time constraints ensure project completion within agreed deadlines, meeting customer expectations and contractual requirements.
form.ownerDescription: Project owners clarify responsibilities and rights, enabling better progress control, problem resolution, and team collaboration.
form.importExampleDescription: Import sample business data to quickly familiarize with AngusTester features and functionality.
form.membersDescription: Define project participants who will automatically receive project data permissions for seamless team collaboration.
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your project goals, scope, and key details..., maximum 2000 characters

module.title: Software Modules
module.aboutDescription: Software modules organize independent functional sets within systems, enabling task division and improved maintainability.
module.noModulesDescription: You haven't added any modules yet.
module.addModuleHint: Press Enter or lose focus to save. Double-click existing modules to edit.
module.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete module 【{name}】?

tag.title: Data Tags
tag.aboutDescription: Data tags categorize tasks and use cases, improving search efficiency and team collaboration. Examples: boundary testing, business process testing, error handling, input validation, security testing, compatibility testing.
tag.addTagHint: Press Enter or lose focus to save. Double-click existing tags to edit.
tag.noTagsDescription: You haven't added any tags yet.
tag.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete tag 【{name}】?
